thread.title: Watch: Rare 'Alice in Wonderland' screen test
thread.title_full: Watch: Rare 'Alice in Wonderland' screen test | www.ajc.com

author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Watch: Rare 'Alice in Wonderland' screen test
text:
Kathryn Beaumont is a Disney legend.
She voiced Alice, in Wonderland. Then she was Wendy Darling in Peter Pan .
She was also the "live-action reference" for both roles , too.
Rare footage from animation 'pencil tests' (Credit: YouTube)
"When I was playing the role of Alice, for Walt Disney, I often had the pleasure of visiting the animators in the studios," she says. "The animators were constantly producing 'pencil tests,'" which were drawings photographed against a background layout then projected on a machine called a moviola.
In the video below, Beaumont shares a rare pencil test.
Rare footage from animation 'pencil tests' (Credit: YouTube)
Rare footage from animation 'pencil tests' (Credit: YouTube) Rare footage from animation 'pencil tests' (Credit: YouTube)
